title: Perma Banned With No Warning (chat ban nor suspension)
body: With no chat bans and suspensions, I got perma banned today. I understand I was toxic and all but my whole team was too and constantly harassing me. I would understand if I got a chat ban or maybe even a suspension but not a perma ban. They said I was intentional feeding, but I wasn't and had a pretty decent score 22/5/9. I'm just really wondering how I got perma banned without a single warning...

replies.body: After reviewing your account's history, it does actually look like this account went through the standard chat restrictions followed by a timed ban, which then led to this perma. If you unsure of what led to this, you're welcome to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get that full context.
